articles.description: Twelve South’s latest accessory is the HiRise3, a $99.99 three-in-one charger designed to keep your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods topped-up with power. It’s a compact alternative to three charging cables.

Offering iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods charging in a neat package
